examples: Committed to building a more just, verdant, and peaceful world.
Where once there was a verdant coconut grove, the ocean now cut through the center of town, connecting to a lagoon.
words.defineVi: đặc trưng bởi sự phong phú của cây xanh

examples: I'm gonna look askew.

words.defineEn: turned or twisted to one side
words.defineVi: quay hoặc xoắn sang một bên

examples: The ball pressure is turgid.
words.defineEn: (of speech or writing) using a serious and elevated style that makes it tedious and complicated
words.defineVi: (của lời nói hoặc văn bản) sử dụng một phong cách nghiêm túc và nâng cao làm cho nó tẻ nhạt và phức tạp

words.defineVi: đầy hoặc thể hiện niềm vui tinh thần cao

examples: Death was livid.

She was livid, right?

words.defineEn: extremely angry, furious, or emotionally agitated
words.defineVi: cực kỳ tức giận, tức giận hoặc kích động về mặt cảm xúc

examples: From dank taverns to dilapidated apartments and claustrophobic police stations, the underbelly of 19th century Saint Petersburg is brought to life by Dostoyevsky’s searing prose.

words.defineEn: (used chiefly as a direction or description in music) loud; with force

words.defineEn: highly excited by eagerness, curiosity, etc.
words.defineVi: bị kích thích cao bởi sự háo hức, tò mò, v.v.

examples: But then, in the early twenty-first century, this sordid little story came into question.

It might seem like we’ve confused History for Geography, but the sordid past of the banana isn’t in the past at all.
But I happen to think that it is a sordid mark, and one that will be a great and longstanding source of shame.
And just picking up on the point David made, if there's an imperative that comes out of this whole sordid tale, it's for a new 9/11 Commission.
words.defineVi: phi đạo đức hoặc không trung thực

examples: Spirit Airlines, the no-frills carrier known for its bright yellow planes, brash style and low fares, has helped revolutionize the way we pay for travel.

words.defineEn: of or relating to a wedding
words.defineVi: của hoặc liên quan đến một đám cưới

examples: When the rival company sent a gift to the CEO, he remembered the saying beware of Greeks bearing gifts and declined the offer, suspecting that they might have had an ulterior motive.

words.defineVi: có bản chất thích hợp hoặc thích hợp

examples: And for every rabid St. Bernard, we get an inspirational story of redemption from a maximum security prison, as in The Green Mile.

examples: On one side of the spectrum you have the aloof posture.

Number four is being aloof and distant in relationships, and this is based on your tendency toward conflict avoidance.
